vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a donated helicopter; and (2) execution of the donation agreement of an aircraft with an estimated value of $2,500,000.00 from Hillwood Development Company, LLC to the Dallas Police Department - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
